songs.title: Thug Love*
songs.lyrics:
Lyrics from Snippet

.....Trust Niggas
The same way i don't trust Bitches
I ain't going lie , i was a Dumb Nigga
A Thug Nigga with a heart..

But you say you want Thug Love
But this ain't no fucking love song (yeah yeah)
Pree when u cry (ah)
Pulling on your Panty Strings, and put them to the side
Wake up , hit it , why you still got your thong on yeah (na na)
You say you want Thug Love
